answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
John – below are links to various CA cities, council and commission reports that I hope are helpful:
City of Santa monica, CA – sample  
http://www01.smgov.net/cityclerk/council/agendas/2011/20110201/s2011020104-A.pdf 
City of Pleasanton, CA – sample  
http://www.ci.pleasanton.ca.us/pdf/staples-hc-item8a-0108.pdf 
City of Menlo Park, CA – sample  
http://service.govdelivery.com/docs/CAMENLO/CAMENLO_101/CAMENLO_101_20100112_en.pdf 
City of Fremont, CA – sample  
http://www.fremont.gov/DocumentView.aspx?DID=3015 
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450
pmuse@transformgov.org

answers.author: Adam Helms
answers.text:
John:
Attached is a template I used when I was working in Howard, WI.  I saw you were also doing some stratgic planning & reporting.  This template has an area for detailing how the item in question relates to the strategic plan.  In this case, purchasing iPads fit in with the Board's goal of being a "Green" community/organization.

author: John Norris
text: We are reviewing the template for the staff reports we provide to Council, and are wondering if anyone knows where to find any best practice examples of staff reports templates.  Thanks!
title: Council staff report template
